file_content.text: A Republic strike force has found us. They must be held off long enough for our techs to recover the data.
The Empire has found us! Our techs are not done downloading the ship's datacore. Hold them off as long as you can.
[BZZT]--ERROR. Identity recognized. Greetings, Captain. Access to the reactor core granted.
Find a way over the Reactor Core pit. Then place the explosives on one of the doors. Ensure the enemy doesn't disarm it before it detonates.
Find a way over the Reactor Core pit. Then place explosives on one of the doors. Ensure the enemy doesn't disarm it before it detonates. Quickly now!
Alert. Unauthorized armaments detected.
Alert. Hull breach--reactor core level. Evacuation protocol initiated. Please proceed through the lifts to the bridge.
Almost there. Access the terminal to download the ship's datacore.
There! Access the terminal, download the ship's datacore and we have it!
[BZZT] Security code recognized. Datacore transfer initialized. Downloading, please stand by.
We've lost our defensive position but it's not over. Recover ground so we can keep downloading the datacore. Override the nearby security terminal to open the door.
We have a link. Stand your ground, we need time to complete the transfer!
Our techs have established a link. Hold your ground long enough for us to complete transferring the datacore.
The Republic has managed a defensive position. Retake the datacore and continue the operation. Override the security terminal, open the door, attack!
Download complete. Republic forces have secured the datacore. Powering down.
You are all heroes today.
A dark day for the Empire.
Download complete. Imperial forces have secured the datacore. Powering down.
We can't win. Pull back!
Victory!
